Congrats folks, this list is growing in membership.  If we can get 25 
more messages after this one, we will have TRIPLED the previous record 
for number of messages.

Here's another proposed character class:

Robot - basic punch is punch.  When the robot is strong enough, it can 
knock oppotents away from the robot with a punch.  1st special: finger 
missiles.  Missiles are fired in various directions surrounding the 
robot.  Alternate requires higher level of intelligence and is missile 
barrage.  All missiles are aimed in one direction.  2nd special:  
spinning laser beam.  alternate: laser beam aimed at one direction.  
3rd special: grenade launcher.  alternate: barrage of grenades  4th 
special spinning arms.  alternate: throw opponent
